jobs.About TransDyne IT Services Pvt Ltd:
TransDyne is based in Hyderabad, India. Using our proprietary software and the latest Internet technologies, we have developed a system for transcription that effectively cuts cost and turnaround time while maintaining the highest level of quality and customer service. We add value to our clients through our customized solutions such as electronic letterhead templates and network compatibility.
SmartTransfer, our custom web based file transfer system with embedded 128 bit encryption programming, allows sending voice files (from a digital recorder) securely over the Internet, 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. Our toll-free telephone system has the same capabilities. Sending dictations and receiving completed transcripts can be done from your home, office or hospital. Our associate company in the United States, TransDyne Inc., markets our products and services and provides customer support in the United States & Canada. Company Website: www.transdyne.in.

jobs.Eligibility Criteria: This position is for candidates who are graduating in the year 2021. The candidate would have majored in Electrical & Electronics Engineering / Electronics and Telecommunication Engineering / Computer Science.
jobs.Job Description:
The Corporate Applications Engineer (CAE) is a Microchip applications engineer providing technical support to customers, clients, distributors, and representatives.
The CAE is knowledgeable and skilled in Microchip products and solutions to guide the customer on selecting, using and troubleshooting products which best fit their requirements.
The CAE enables customer self-sufficiency by writing knowledge base articles, application notes, user’s guide, and developing and presenting training.
This person will work closely with Microchip FAE, Sales and Marketing teams to provide pre- and post-sales support and solutions to customers.
The CAE is passionate about making customers succeed in the marketplace.
jobs.Desired Skills:
Knowledge of Microcontroller: Knowledge of 8051, ARM, AVR or PIC Microcontrollers will be an advantage.
Knowledge of protocols used in the industry: Exposure to protocols used in communication and control will be a an advantage.
Knowledge of peripheral: Exposure to peripherals like ADC, CAN, I2C, PWM, SPI, USART and USB will be an advantage.
Aptitude for Debug: Problem solving and the ability to debug are highly desired.
Good communication skills: Communication is vital to any organization. Candidates should be able to demonstrate good written and oral communication.
jobs.Note:
Candidates whose final year projects attest to the candidates interest in embedded systems will be valued.
Similarly, knowledge of the semiconductor industry and the various players in the industry would be an advantage.

jobs.Eligibility Criteria:

jobs.Job Responsibilities:
Develop complex designs, implement Cisco leading-edge technologies worldwide and provide optimization services to the largest networks and customers in the world.
Consult to solve problems that cross a broad range of technologies and determine the best solutions for customers.
Review network requirements and propose designs to meet business needs.
Build and maintain relationships with a variety of customers.
jobs.About Cisco:
Cisco Systems Inc is the worldwide leader in networking for the Internet. The company was founded in 1984 by two computer scientists from Stanford University seeking an easier way to connect different types of computer systems.
Cisco Systems shipped its first product in 1986 and is now a multi-national corporation, with over 35,000 employees in more than 115 countries. Today, Cisco solutions are the networking foundations for service providers, small to medium business and enterprise customers which includes corporations, government agencies, utilities and educational institutions.
Cisco’s networking solutions connect people, computing devices and computer networks, allowing people to access or transfer information without regard to differences in time, place or type of computer system.
If anyone can lay claim to a ‘heritage’ in an industry as young as global networking, then it is Cisco. Not only does 85 percent of Internet traffic travel across Cisco’s systems, we also use the Internet to run our own business online, from product orders and inventory management through to staff communications and travel expenses.
So as you explore the possibilities for your business, start at the beginning. Cisco Systems built the Internet so we know exactly what it takes to get your business online. Take advantage of our experience and knowledge to get the Internet working effectively for your business. Company Website: www.cisco.com.

jobs.Job Summary: About the team: The Alexa Data Services (ADS) organization provides data creation, curation, and analytics services to help develop, test, and train the Alexa AI. We work closely with Amazon Machine Learning (ML) Science and modeling teams, providing the critical data they need to improve Alexas speech recognition and language understanding capabilities.
jobs.Job Description:
We are hiring Data Associates (1 year contract) in our Hyderabad team to undertake labeling functions such as transcription, annotation and dialogue evaluation on speech & text data to assess and improve Alexas performance.
As a Data Associate, you will work on speech and text data.
We value your high attention to details and your ability to adapt to dynamic changes due to emerging business requirements.
You are recognized as a role model for your proactivity in identifying issues with efficiency and accuracy.
jobs.Job Responsibilities:
Work with text, speech and other types of data and attach tags to the contents, at scale.
Deliver high quality of labeled data, leveraging guidelines to meet specific key performance indicators, and using in-house tools and software.
Report issues with tools and software to the development team when necessary.
Provide feedback for improvements to existing tooling that can increase labeling throughput and quality.
Maintain strict confidentiality and follow all applicable Amazon policies for securing confidential information.
Proficiency in English, Hindi grammar and spelling (both written and verbal).
Comfortable working with speech from various dialects and accents of Hindi.
Willingness and flexibility to work in shifts including night shift etc.
jobs.Note:
Work Location: Hyderabad (Only candidates currently in Hyderabad are eligible).
Job Type: Contractual role for 1 year.
jobs.Basic Qualifications:
High School or Equivalent diploma
Work Experience: Maximum of 24 months of experience in any industry
Proficient computer skills in MS Office with good typing speed (> 40 wpm and >90% accuracy), including basic troubleshooting with the ability to utilize proprietary tools.
